title: Post-Hearing Analysis with Andrea Mitchell, Katy Tur, and Hallie Jackson (Hearing #4, 6/21/22)
description: Andrea Mitchell, Katy Tur, and Hallie Jackson along with a range of expert guests review the highlights of the fourth hearing presenting the findings of the investigation by the January 6th Committee.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
